description: Comprehensive civic alert management platform for emergency response, community notifications, and public safety communications. Supports AMBER, Silver, Blue alerts and general purpose community alerts.
features: Emergency alert management (AMBER, Silver, Blue alerts)
Anonymous tip reporting and citizen input
Emergency response coordination and manhunt mode
Mobile access for officers and citizens
Comprehensive admin panel for emergency management

alertTypes.name: AMBER Alert
alertTypes.criteria: Children ≤ 17, believed to be in imminent danger

alertTypes.name: Silver Alert
alertTypes.description: Missing senior citizens with dementia or cognitive impairment
alertTypes.criteria: Person with Alzheimer’s/dementia or cognitive decline at risk

alertTypes.name: Blue Alert
alertTypes.description: Law enforcement officer harmed, suspect at large
alertTypes.criteria: Violent suspect who killed or seriously injured officer, still at large

alertTypes.name: CLEAR Alert
alertTypes.description: Missing or abducted adults in immediate danger

alertTypes.name: Endangered Missing Alert
alertTypes.description: Any missing person in danger or with vulnerabilities
alertTypes.criteria: Missing person of any age under dangerous conditions

alertTypes.name: Camo Alert
alertTypes.criteria: Missing veteran or military-affiliated with mental health issues

alertTypes.name: Turquoise Alert
alertTypes.description: Missing endangered tribal or Indigenous persons
alertTypes.criteria: Missing endangered tribal persons under 65 under suspicious conditions

alertTypes.name: National Alert
alertTypes.criteria: National emergencies, natural disasters, security threats

alertTypes.name: General Community Alert
alertTypes.description: Community notifications, lost pets, general warnings
alertTypes.criteria: Community notifications, lost pets, general warnings
